suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer Patrick Williams (CUST_0118), a midwife with medium risk rating, conducted $222,070.26 in 79 transactions from 2025-02-05 to 2025-08-04, including high-value transactions and unusual ATM behavior. Activity triggers suspicion of money laundering due to significant net flow and irregular ATM transactions. Financial institution flagged suspicious activity for potential SAR filing under the Bank Secrecy Act, considering the patterns of concern and medium risk level.
